title: Pixel Piracy (Latest With 1.0.12 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Srry guys, my previous torrent of Pixel piracy is outdated. I accidently uploaded the wrong version. This torrent is the latest version of the game with the latest 1.0.12 patch. Hope you guys enjoy and change notes below.


------------------


Changelog for version 1.012:


New features

* Added pirate flag ship item (buy from sailing store, place on top mast)
* Added flag editor in ship builder (left mouse to paint, right mouse to erase) We wanna see your customized flags!

* Press interact near your pets to "pet" them

* Mount command is now called Carry/Release. Pick up pets (and crewmates) and release them (unmount) with the same button

* Shoveling now has its own separate UI command button, no longer tied to interact

* Added a new type of rare island (see if you can find one!)

Bug Fixes

* Fixed bug where it was possible to plunder enemy ship while grappling to it, resulting in drowning

* Fixed bug where some old saves could not be loaded and migrated

Minor stuff

* Added "funny" messages to the main menu

* Added a button to join the Quadro Delta live chat to the main menu (come and say Hi! :))

* Plunder and Capture command buttons are now disabled if you can't use those commands

* Mac OS and Linux moved to main branch

* Added a button in main menu settings to open save folder location 


-----------------------


Pixel Piracy is a side-scrolling 2d, real time strategy/sandbox/simulation game created by indie developer Vitali Kirpu and produced by Alexander Poysky.

In the game, the player leads the life of a pirate captain. Recruit a crew, outfit and customize your ship and set sail on the open seas. There youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll use any combination of aggression, diversion and trade to become the most infamous pirate crew of the seven seas! You can raid, pillage and plunder everything in your path, divert and lie to get what you want or trade for a quick buck. Remember to be careful though, death is everywhere and quite permanent! Adventure awaitsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ 


    
* Parrots, pets, and plunder!!
    
* Comprehensive loot system, upgrade-able weapons and armor, special and secret loot to deck out your sailors.
    
* A sandbox open world pirate simulator with a procedurally generated world that changes each new game you play.
